SELECT d.id, f.url AS background_url, d.title, d.general, c.category_name, d.url, d.`like`, d.comment, d.write_time, d.view_scope FROM doc d LEFT JOIN file_storage f ON d.background_id = f.id LEFT JOIN doc_category c ON d.category_id = c.id WHERE d.is_delete = 0 AND #{viewScope} >= d.view_scope
AND d.category_id = #{categoryId}
AND (d.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR d.general LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
ORDER BY d.write_time
